StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetSMCRReserveUnitByCollegePro.leId]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CollegePro.leID uniqueiden..er, @Organiza.onID int, @FiscalYear int
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT
cpsmcr.SMCRReserveUnitID, cpsmcr.CollegePro.leID, cpsmcr.UserLogin, cpsmcr.UpdateDate, sr.Organiza.onID, sr.FiscalYear, sr.[Remarks], sr.SMCRReserveUnitName, sr.[E1ThruE5Popula.on],
-- POC Informa.on pc.[PointOfContactID], RTRIM (pc.POCLastName) AS POCLastName, RTRIM(pc.POCFirstName) AS POCFirstName, pc.POCLegalMiddleName, pc.[Street1], pc.[Street2], pc.[City], pc.[State], pc.[ZipCode], pc.[TelephoneNumber], pc.[CellPhoneNumber], pc.[FaxNumber], pc.[EmailAddress]
FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.leSMCRReserveUnit] cpsmcr INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[SMCRReserveUnit] sr ON sr.SMCRReserveUnitID = cpsmcr.SMCRReserveUnitID LEFT OUTER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] pc ON pc.PointOfContactID = sr.PointOfContactID
WHERE cpsmcr.CollegePro.leID = @CollegePro.leID AND sr.Organiza.onID = @Organiza.onID AND sr.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
